Snapchat is an app that keeps you in touch with friends and family thanks to its interactive, multimedia messaging system. Share your favorite events live or record them as video messages that automatically disappear without a trace after a few seconds.

Easily add Snapchat friends by selecting a username on any webpage and right-clicking to add them directly to your Snapchat contacts. This extension provides a convenient way to connect with people on Snapchat without the need to manually search for their username in the app.

Key Features:

Mobile Version HOT
Context Menu Integration: Right-click on any selected text (username) and instantly add the user to your Snapchat friends list with a single click.
Automatic Opening of Onet.pl: Upon installation, the extension automatically opens the Onet.pl website in a new tab.
Use Snapchat in Your Browser: Take advantage of Snapchat directly in your browser with the "Snapchat for Chrome" extension, which allows you to interact with Snapchat without needing to use the mobile app.
Seamless Integration: The extension integrates smoothly with your browser, adding a Snapchat icon to your toolbar.
How It Works:

Select the Username: Highlight the Snapchat username you want to add.
Right-Click: Use the context menu and click "Add to Snapchat."
Snapchat Web: The Snapchat web interface will open with the selected username, allowing you to add the user to your contacts.
Icons: The extension includes custom icons to enhance your experience.

Permissions Required:

Context Menus: To add the "Add to Snapchat" option to your right-click menu.
Tabs: To open new tabs for adding Snapchat friends and visiting Onet.pl.
How to Use:

Install the extension.
Snapchat for Chrome: With this extension, you can use Snapchat directly from your browser, making it easier to manage your Snapchat account alongside your other browsing activities.

This extension is perfect for users who frequently add friends on Snapchat and want a quicker way to do so directly from any webpage.
